channel.title: Need help with a command like ::acdon
channel.description: Hey all, since we all know you got the command ::yell that will work when you typ it so evry1 can read it, is there also a way to make ::accdon for people who can donate rs accounts? that it would be like this ::accdon Donate now a runescape account for donator status that evry1 sees that when u just typ ::accdon? need help with it please :)

item.title: Need help with a command like ::acdon
item.dc:creator: @E_z_Range E z Range
item.description:
@E_z_Range wrote:

Heres my command, you might have to edit it somewhat to work with your server, shouldnt be too hard to figure it out.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("accdon") && c.playerRights == 3) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("Please remember to vote @ Voting Link"); } } } else { c.sendMessage("Error sending message."); }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a command like ::acdon

item.title: Need help with a command like ::acdon
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Quinten117, post:5, topic:380966”][quote author=E z Range link=topic=476783.msg3487204#msg3487204 date=1296679248]
Do you mean that when you use the command, accdon, that it sends the message “You can donate runescape accounts for donator status” to all online players, or something along the lines of that?
[/quote]

yes that it will shown up at the chat for all online players[/quote]

Are you using Project Insanity, Delta, or what?

Read full topic
